project.name: Sock Shop
project.description: Sock Shop: A Microservice Demo Application

projectProperties.PROJECT.POO_CAT.HIGH: Frequency of the usage of the related function is >10 times per week.
projectProperties.PROJECT.POO_CAT.LOW: Frequency of the usage of the related function is <10 times per year.
projectProperties.PROJECT.POO_CAT.MEDIUM: Frequency of the usage of the related function is <10 times per week.

SOCKSHOP-129.name: Payment takes 183 seconds instead of allowed 3 seconds.

SOCKSHOP-124.id: ${#####} !!!-CLARIFICATION-NEEDED-!!! we assume this will be provided by the unified REST endpoint
SOCKSHOP-124.name: As a user I want to be able to do payments
SOCKSHOP-124.description: Implement a payment service that integrates with Payment Service Providers and allows a secure and reliable payment for merchandise offered in the Sock Shop.

SOCKSHOP-123.id: ${#####} !!!-CLARIFICATION-NEEDED-!!! we assume this will be provided by the unified REST endpoint
SOCKSHOP-123.name: Provide discount for the next purchase
SOCKSHOP-123.description: If a payment cannot be processed within the required time provide a discount for the next purchase for the same customer to make them come back.

SOCKSHOP-125.id: ${#####} !!!-CLARIFICATION-NEEDED-!!! we assume this will be provided by the unified REST endpoint
SOCKSHOP-125.name: As a user I want my payments to be processed quickly

configSpec.name: Less than 3 seconds for a payment
configSpec.description: The payment must be accepted in less than 3 seconds in 99.99% of payments

funcSpec.name: The payment must be confirmed in less than a set interval
funcSpec.description: A payment must be completed with the Payment Service Provider within the given time interval
funcSpec.acceptanceCriteria: The desired payment interval can be configured on system level.

SOCKSHOP-126.id: ${#####} !!!-CLARIFICATION-NEEDED-!!! we assume this will be provided by the unified REST endpoint
SOCKSHOP-126.name: If payments take too long we can loose business and customers
SOCKSHOP-126.description: We have discovered that our competitors lost customers if payments take too long, so we should avoid payments taking too long./

SOCKSHOP-128.id: ${#####} !!!-CLARIFICATION-NEEDED-!!! we assume this will be provided by the unified REST endpoint
SOCKSHOP-128.name: Containerized Infrastructure
SOCKSHOP-128.description: The system should be set up as containerized infrastructure in the openshift cluster.
SOCKSHOP-128.systemDesignSpec: Use containerized infrastructure to support quick and easy provisioning of a multitude of micro services that do one thing only and one thing right and fast.
SOCKSHOP-128.softwareDesignSpec: Implement the system using a loosely coupled micro services architecture for improved extensibility and maintainability.
